[[Image:W.A.R. Hadley 14 December 1970.p: *'''Subject:''' Christmas letter with updates on the Tolkien family happenings of 1970.
The letter includes references to:<ref name=TL/>
*The death of [[Hilary Tolkien]]'s wife Magdalen on 5 April
*Her requiem and burial perfomed by [[Edith Tolkien
*Hilary's son Gabriel, wife and children moving from Wesham to live with him
*Pending visits from son John and daughter [[Priscilla Tolkien
